DataElement.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Head Trauma Outcome
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Outcome/result from the participant's medical history of head trauma.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Participant Personal Medical History Head Trauma
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Participant medical history - head trauma: damage inflicted on the head as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Someone who takes part in an activity.:A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual.  In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: Someone who takes part in an activity.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Property.preferredDefinition: The anterior or superior part of an animal, containing the brain, or chief ganglia of the nervous system, the mouth, and in the higher animals, the chief sensory organs. (On-line Medical Dictionary):Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

Concepts.definition: The anterior and superior part of a human bearing the mouth, the brain and sensory organs.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/25/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Greater Than Minute Loss Of Consciousness

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Greater Than Minute Loss Of Consciousness
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.: The neurologic status characterized by the occurrence of a loss of the ability to perceive and respond.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A unit measure of time equal to 60 seconds.
An inability to purposefully respond to stimuli.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The anterior or superior part of an animal, containing the brain, or chief ganglia of the nervous system, the mouth, and in the higher animals, the chief sensory organs. (On-line Medical Dictionary):Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.:Outcome; a phenomenon that follows and is caused by some previous phenomenon.

Concepts.definition: The anterior and superior part of a human bearing the mouth, the brain and sensory organs.
Damage inflicted on the body as the direct or indirect result of an external force, with or without disruption of structural continuity.
